LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Pyro.label: Activate pyroprojector
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Pyro.description: Activate this person's pyroprojector module. It will produce great amounts of heat and apply fire damage to anything within range.
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Mag.label: Activate magprojector
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Mag.description: Activate this person's magprojector module. It will produce electromagnetic disturbances that damage and stun any nearby electronic equipment, mechanoids or users of certain implants.
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Med.label: Activate medprojector
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Med.description: Activate this person's medprojector module. It will heal anyone within range.
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Rad.label: Activate radprojector
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Rad.description: Activate this person's radprojector module. It will produce great amounts harmful radiation, causing toxic buildup in anything within range.
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Cryo.label: Activate cryoprojector
LanguageData.BM_AuraModule_Attack_Cryo.description: Activate this person's cryoprojector module. It will cool down any enclosed spaces and cause hypothermia in anything within range.
